name: view_message
description: View a specific message in the conversation.
parameters: {'message_text': 'What is the text of the message you want to view?'}

name: send_message
parameters: {'message_text': 'What is the text you want to send?'}

name: add_attachment
description: Add an attachment (file, location, or media) to the message.
parameters: {'attachment_type': 'What type of attachment do you want to add? [Files, Location, Camera, Gallery]'}

name: record_audio_message
description: Record and send an audio message.

name: call_contact
description: Make a call to the contact in the conversation.

name: search_conversation
description: Search for something within the conversation.
parameters: {'search_query': 'What do you want to search for in the conversation?'}

name: open_more_options
description: Open additional conversation options (e.g., delete, mute, etc.).

name: navigate_back
description: Navigate back to the previous screen or conversation list.

name: resend_message
description: Resend a previously sent message in the conversation.
parameters: {'message_text': 'What is the text of the message you want to resend?'}
